main.name: Alwyn Ong
main.description: Software Developer | Tech Enthusiast | Part-time Gamer
main.bio: I am a penultimate Information Systems undergraduate from Singapore Management University (SMU), with an interest in Software Development. I am passionate about technology and using it to solve problems, including my own. Check out my projects below!

description: Business Intelligence & Analytics - Data Associate Program

work.title: Developer Intern
description: Developed system to track candidates utilising SharePoint platform (SharePoint REST APIs, JavaScript/jQuery)
Developed SharePoint WebPart to help with various use cases (SharePoint Framework (SPFx), JavaScript)
Setup NLP (Sentiment Analysis, Removal of Stop Words) for form responses, automating scripts to call Google Cloud APIs via Google Cloud Platform (JavaScript)
Setup, managed and regularly updated information system for tech leads and recruiters to support recruitment event
Helped to port files and systems to new SharePoint Team Site
Wrote various scripts to help automate tasks (VBA)

work.title: Software Developer Intern
description: Leveraged existing framework to fix and improve upon company website, fixing existing bugs and publishing new pages
Setup an automatic email reply system for new users to receive a confirmation email
Setup Google Analytics on website and setup dashboard to collect data for analysis on user demographics
Analyse current customer journey to come up with business process workflow model for process analysis
Refined and improved on business model for new feature on mobile app
Helped with ideation for customer acquisition for mobile app

projects.title: Vessel Tracking System
projects.description: Vessel Tracking System for Port of Singapore Authority (PSA)

projects.title: Mahjong Score Calculator
projects.description: A website to help you calculate the score (tai), based on your current tiles.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A website to showcase my portfolio.

projects.title: FBS Booker
projects.description: Tool to automate booking of facilities in SMU's Facility Booking System (FBS). A video demo can be found on the Github link.

projects.title: SGLoveLah
projects.description: Sample dating website, blurs images and only unblurs upon both users pressing a "Ready Button"
